docs.snippet: The embattled Uruguayan player had requested a transfer, and a World Cup bite of an Italian opponent forced the Premier League club’s hand.
docs.lead_paragraph: The embattled Uruguayan player had requested a transfer, and a World Cup bite of an Italian opponent forced the Premier League club’s hand.
docs.abstract: Luis Suarez, Uruguayan soccer star who received suspension during the World Cup after biting an opponent, transfers to the Barcelona soccer club; incident put increased pressure on former team Liverpool to grant transfer that he had requested.

headline.main: Liverpool Will Let Luis Suárez Go to Barcelona
headline.print_headline: Suspended Suárez Gets New Team: Barcelona

docs.snippet: Marcelo looked wide-eyed, stunned when he scored the first goal of the World Cup ... against his own team. Hardly the most auspicious of starts for Brazil. But that blooper just 11 minutes into the tournament was soon forgiven and forgotten as Brazil...
docs.lead_paragraph: Marcelo looked wide-eyed, stunned when he scored the first goal of the World Cup ... against his own team. Hardly the most auspicious of starts for Brazil. But that blooper just 11 minutes into the tournament was soon forgiven and forgotten as Brazil went on to win that opening game and the 2014 World Cup quickly flowered into a roaring success, confounding doom and gloom merchants who predicted Brazil couldn't pull it off without major protests and problems.

docs.snippet: It's the day of the last World Cup finale in Brazil. Pele is nine years old. Back then, he's just Edson Arantes do Nascimento.
